channel.title: RSC pk day
channel.description:
So this is the general idea:
-close all servers. -keep one up. -All closed server forums will redirect to that server that is open. -Make that one server a pk server where everyone will play for a day.
Reason: Benefit for the whole community. Why: We already know for a while that the community has been decreasing and could bring some old and new players to the community. Will be fun for the whole community also.
The frequency could be discuss maybe 1 day every week or 2 weeks. Server could be put up by the most trusted server.(most likely rscangel) Pk server could be any format really. stork,havok, w.e. So no need for a entirely new written source. So this would be great if all server admins would agree and see the benefit for all.
Discuss.

item.title: RSC pk day
item.dc:creator: @nacional nacional
item.description:
@nacional wrote:

Kryptix could you get started on this? All you need really is to set up a date since you don’t have to write
up an entire whole source and all of that.

Also it seems like your the only server up lol, so we don’t have to do the whole wait to agree for other
admins to agree.

Read full topic

item.title: RSC pk day
item.dc:creator: @all_day All Day
item.description:
@all_day wrote:

I will happily close RSCEmulation for a day and host a modified version which is basically a PK server made out of RSCEmulation’s source but I’m not going to force players to play a server that I don’t control or even know is safe… But if everyone wants a PK day it can be done using a temporarily database and giving everyone commands to spawn shit and change their stats.

That’d be epic Luke. Maybe like one every two months or so? I’d love to play that.

Read full topic

item.title: RSC pk day
item.dc:creator: @nacional nacional
item.description:
@nacional wrote:

Sweet ok so we got the admin with the largest community agreeing to this.
I guess we’ll see what the admins have to say. Which I guess means we wait
for peeter since I think that’s the only other server up. I guess if he says yes, it’ll
be run by both of them for that one day and then we just build hype and get
tons of players to play that day, and maybe grow the rsc playerbase a bit.

Read full topic

item.title: RSC pk day
item.dc:creator: @nacional nacional
item.description:
@nacional wrote:

bump.
Rsc “server power” has changed, the server who used to have most players
didn’t agree to this last time. Now that, that has changed and time has passed
let’s see if any server admins agree.
re-discuss?

Read full topic

no, majority of servers are not PK servers

pk or stake. Staking could be incorporated somehow.
